page_content:
FY2019 GLOBAL CITIZENSHIP ANNUAL REPORT
OUR EMPLOYEES068 
Looking Forward: Our Employees 
In FY2020, we plan to focus on retention by offering our employees a new  
way to grow their careers through the launch of an internal program that  
focuses on career development and internal mobility aligned with opportunities 
for growth. The program emphasizes learning and development to build 
one’s skill sets, provides better visibility for employees into new internal 
jobs and offers improved insights to hiring managers about employees who 
could contribute to their team’s success.
